values-param.name: classpath.resources
values-param.description: The resources that start with the following package name should be load from file system

values-param.name: init.resources
values-param.description: Store the following resources into the db for the first launch

values-param.name: portal.resource.names
values-param.description: The properties files of the portal , those file will be merged into one ResourceBundle properties

value-param.name: shareable
value-param.description: Whether to share metadatas when an associated object has been shared to a different space or to a user

value-param.name: allowMultipleItemsPerObject
value-param.description: Whether to allow adding the same object to the same Metadata or not

value-param.name: siteName
value-param.description: name of site in which artifact is deployed

value-param.name: override
value-param.description: indicates if this plugin will override data over legacy data, default value:false

object-param.name: Jpg Document content with special chars in name

component-plugin.name: init.service.listener
component-plugin.description: this listener populate organization data for the first launch
